data.name: Mojito the Cat: 3d Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
Mojito the Cat: 3D Puzzle Cat labyrinth game will push your space vision to the limit, use the logic to find the shortest path to the exit.
Rotate the pieces to reach all coins, get the fish scrape and go to the gate to jump to the next level
Help Mojito the Cute Cat explore the different worlds, unlock all characterized skins and solve all the puzzles with the few number of movements to get 3 golden cubes in every level.

  • 6 Worlds: Trainning Gardens, Oasis, Woodland, Winter, Magma & Last World
  • 60 3D Puzzle Labyrinth Levels
  • 11 Cute & Unique hand painted 3d cube Skins. Customize your player cube
  • Stylized Cartoon graphics
  • Cube Style Assets
  • Easy starting levels for newbie players
  • Hard ending levels for extreme players
  • 3 Star Rating System
  • Satisfying sounds
  • Smooth cube movement
